naslov: Prodaja - Kuća s 3 zasebna stana 320 m2 - Gornji Stenjevec (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Kuća s 3 zasebna stana 320 m2 - Gornji Stenjevec Prošećite nekretninom na linku: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=g6xGJSm4xdQ Prodajemo višeetažnu kuću u Gornjem Stenjevcu neto realne površine 319,57 m2, izgrađenu 1968. godine na parceli površine 612 m2. Kuća ima prekrasnu uređenu okućnicu cca 400 m2 te se sastoji od: Podruma površine 35,65 m2: spremište 1 površine 18,43 m2 i spremište 2 površine 17,22 m2. Prizemlja površine 89,84 m2 - sastoji se od dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom, spavaće sobe, ulaznog prostora / verande, kupaonice i hodnika. Polukata s dodatnom spavaćom sobom s galerijom i balkonom i 1.kata površine 99,37 m2 - sastoji se od 2 velike sobe, kuhinje, kupaonice, ostave, balkona i hodnika. Visokog potkrovlja površine 88,04 m2 - sastoji se od dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom, balkona, 2 spavaće sobe, kupaonice, wc-a i hodnika. Pomoćnog objekta s garažom površine 49 m2. 2005. godine je rađena adaptacija - promijenjena je PVC stolarija na cijeloj kući, uređeno je prizemlje i potkrovlje, novi krov, toplinska fasada, kupaonske instalacije. Grijanje je plinsko centralno + peć na drva. Jedno je brojilo za plin, ali tavan ima svoj bojler, dok ostatak kuće ima plin na kotao + bojler za vodu. Kuća je na jednoj strani samo naslonjena na drugu kuću / dvojni objekt. Kuća ima sve dozvole. For Sale - House with 3 Separate Apartments 320 sqm - Gornji Stenjevec Take a virtual tour of the property at the link: https://my.matterport.com/show/?m=g6xGJSm4xdQ We are selling a 4 floors house in Gornji Stenjevec with a total area of 319.57 sqm, built in 1968 on a plot of 612 sqm. The house has a beautifully landscaped garden of approximately 400 sqm and consists of: Basement with an area of 35.65 sqm: storage room 1 with an area of 18.43 sqm and storage room 2 with an area of 17.22 sqm. Ground floor with an area of 89.84 sqm - consisting of a living room with a kitchen, bedroom, entrance area / veranda, bathroom, and hallway. Intermediate floor with an additional bedroom with a gallery and balcony, and 1st floor with an area of 99.37 sqm - consisting of 2 large rooms, kitchen, bathroom, pantry, balcony, and hallway. High attic with an area of 88.04 sqm - consisting of a living room with a kitchen, balcony, 2 bedrooms, bathroom, toilet, and hallway. Auxiliary building with a garage with an area of 49 sqm. In 2005, there was a renovation - PVC windows were replaced throughout the house, the ground floor and attic were renovated, a new roof was installed, thermal insulation facade, and bathroom installations. Heating is provided by gas central heating + wood stove. There is one gas meter, but the attic has its own boiler, while the rest of the house has gas for the boiler + water heater. The house is attached on one side to another house / semi-detached object. The house has all permits. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Petrinjska 22, Zagreb Federica Grisogona 8, Zadar
